quote: Communism is the opiate of the intellectuals [With] no cure except as a guillotine might be called a cure for dandruff.
England is perhaps the only great country whose intellectuals are ashamed of their own nationality.
I hate intellectuals. They are from the top down. I am from the bottom up.
Intellectuals solve problems; geniuses prevent them.
Like most intellectuals, he is immensely stupid.
Only morons would ever think of themselves as intellectuals. That's why they all look so sad.
Unlike the masses, intellectuals have a taste for rationality and an interest in facts.
